from aiot_lcd1602 import LCD1602
from mqtt import *
from machine import RTC
import ntptime
import time
from yolobit import *
button_a.on_pressed = None
button_b.on_pressed = None
button_a.on_pressed_ab = button_b.on_pressed_ab = -1
from event_manager import *
from machine import Pin, SoftI2C
from aiot_dht20 import DHT20
from aiot_rgbled import RGBLed

aiot_lcd1602 = LCD1602()

event_manager.reset()

# Mô tả hàm này...
def AUTO_PUMP():
  global th_C3_B4ng_tin, LIGHT, AUTO, AIR_TEMP, AIR_HUM, SOIL_HUM, aiot_lcd1602, aiot_dht20, tiny_rgb
  if (round(translate((pin1.read_analog()), 0, 4095, 0, 100))) <= 10:
    pin10.write_analog(round(translate(0, 0, 100, 0, 1023)))
    mqtt.publish('may-bom', '1')
  if (round(translate((pin1.read_analog()), 0, 4095, 0, 100))) > 20:
    pin10.write_analog(round(translate(0, 0, 100, 0, 1023)))
    mqtt.publish('may-bom', '0')

aiot_dht20 = DHT20(SoftI2C(scl=Pin(22), sda=Pin(21)))

def on_event_timer_callback_w_s_p_U_T():
  global th_C3_B4ng_tin, LIGHT, AIR_TEMP, AIR_HUM, SOIL_HUM, AUTO
  aiot_dht20.read_dht20()
  AIR_TEMP = aiot_dht20.dht20_temperature()
  AIR_HUM = aiot_dht20.dht20_humidity()
  SOIL_HUM = round(translate((pin1.read_analog()), 0, 4095, 0, 100))
  LIGHT = round(translate((pin2.read_analog()), 0, 4095, 0, 100))
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(0, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('AT:')
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(3, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(AIR_TEMP)
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(7, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('*C')
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(10, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('AH:')
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(13, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(AIR_HUM)
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(15, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('%')
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(0, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('LUX:')
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(4, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(LIGHT)
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(6, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('% ')
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(9, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('SH:')
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(13, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(SOIL_HUM)
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(15, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('%')
  mqtt.publish('nhiet-do', AIR_TEMP)
  mqtt.publish('do-am-khong-khi', AIR_HUM)
  mqtt.publish('do-am-dat', SOIL_HUM)
  mqtt.publish('anh-sang', LIGHT)

event_manager.add_timer_event(15000, on_event_timer_callback_w_s_p_U_T)

def on_mqtt_message_receive_callback__tinh_trang_(th_C3_B4ng_tin):
  global LIGHT, AIR_TEMP, AIR_HUM, SOIL_HUM, AUTO
  AUTO = th_C3_B4ng_tin
  AUTO2()

tiny_rgb = RGBLed(pin16.pin, 4)

def on_mqtt_message_receive_callback__b_ng_den_(th_C3_B4ng_tin):
  global LIGHT, AIR_TEMP, AIR_HUM, SOIL_HUM, AUTO
  if th_C3_B4ng_tin == '1':
    tiny_rgb.show(0, hex_to_rgb('#ffffff'))
  else:
    tiny_rgb.show(0, hex_to_rgb('#000000'))

def on_mqtt_message_receive_callback__may_bom_(th_C3_B4ng_tin):
  global LIGHT, AIR_TEMP, AIR_HUM, SOIL_HUM, AUTO
  if th_C3_B4ng_tin == '1':
    pin10.write_analog(round(translate(70, 0, 100, 0, 1023)))
  else:
    pin10.write_analog(round(translate(0, 0, 100, 0, 1023)))

# Mô tả hàm này...
def _C4_90_C4_83ng_k_C3_BD_server():
  global th_C3_B4ng_tin, LIGHT, AUTO, AIR_TEMP, AIR_HUM, SOIL_HUM, aiot_lcd1602, aiot_dht20, tiny_rgb
  mqtt.on_receive_message('tinh-trang', on_mqtt_message_receive_callback__tinh_trang_)
  mqtt.on_receive_message('b-ng-den', on_mqtt_message_receive_callback__b_ng_den_)
  mqtt.on_receive_message('may-bom', on_mqtt_message_receive_callback__may_bom_)

# Mô tả hàm này...
def AUTO_LED():
  global th_C3_B4ng_tin, LIGHT, AUTO, AIR_TEMP, AIR_HUM, SOIL_HUM, aiot_lcd1602, aiot_dht20, tiny_rgb
  LIGHT = round(translate((pin2.read_analog()), 0, 4095, 0, 100))
  if LIGHT <= 10:
    tiny_rgb.show(0, hex_to_rgb('#ffffff'))
    mqtt.publish('b-ng-den', '1')
  else:
    tiny_rgb.show(0, hex_to_rgb('#000000'))
    mqtt.publish('b-ng-den', '0')

# Mô tả hàm này...
def AUTO_FAN():
  global th_C3_B4ng_tin, LIGHT, AUTO, AIR_TEMP, AIR_HUM, SOIL_HUM, aiot_lcd1602, aiot_dht20, tiny_rgb
  if (aiot_dht20.dht20_temperature()) >= 34:
    pin14.write_digital(1)
  if (aiot_dht20.dht20_temperature()) < 33:
    pin14.write_digital(0)

# Mô tả hàm này...
def AUTO2():
  global th_C3_B4ng_tin, LIGHT, AUTO, AIR_TEMP, AIR_HUM, SOIL_HUM, aiot_lcd1602, aiot_dht20, tiny_rgb
  if AUTO == '1':
    AUTO_FAN()
    AUTO_LED()
    AUTO_PUMP()
    time.sleep_ms(1000)

if True:
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(3, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('SMART FARM')
  mqtt.connect_wifi('tringuyen', '23456789')
  mqtt.connect_broker(server='io.adafruit.com', port=1883, username='tringuyennek', password='aio_kgAc827hGozCVrxabIaQOAdG5Rcs')
  ntptime.settime()
  (year, month, mday, week_of_year, hour, minute, second, milisecond) = RTC().datetime()
  RTC().init((year, month, mday, week_of_year, hour+7, minute, second, milisecond))
  aiot_lcd1602.clear()
  _C4_90_C4_83ng_k_C3_BD_server()
  display.scroll('OK')

while True:
  mqtt.check_message()
  event_manager.run()
  time.sleep_ms(1000)
name: SMART FARM
